title: Gamification-Enhanced Competency Development Program for [Self-Directed] Social Sector Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of gamification fundamentals, digital device proficiency, and specialized experience in social sectors
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical application skills through project-based assessments, with digital devices (tablets/laptops) provided

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five stages of a gamification design framework (based on ADDIE).
Learners can design three or more gamification elements (e.g., challenge tasks, reward systems) tailored to the target job role.
Learners can collaboratively develop and present a 2â€“4-week social domain educational scenario using gamification tools and evaluate it in teams.
Learners can explain methods to measure the effectiveness of gamification using quantitative metrics (engagement rates, learning achievement).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
